name: LaBella Signature Gift Box
description:
Looking for a great gift without the hassle of wrapping it yourself? Or maybe you want to treat yourself to a few LaBella products at a great price? Either way, we have the perfect solution -- the LaBella Signature Gift Box! 

This box features some of our most popular products in SIX different scent combinations with some of our most loved fragrances!

Each box includes:

1. 4oz Whipped Soap Soufflé
2. 4oz LaBella Signature Body Polish
3. 4oz Body Butter
4. 2oz Green Machine Face Scrub
5. 1oz LaFace Creme
6. 0.5oz Nouveau Lip Salve or Mask

You choose the scent combination:

Citrus (Ginger Lime, Citrus Sangria, etc.)
Floral (White Lily & Jasmine, Honeysuckle, FlowerBomb, etc.)
Fresh (Peppermint, Lemongrass Verbena, etc.)
Tropical (Hawaiian Hibiscus, Pomegranate Mango, etc.)

Classic (Black Musk, Woodland Paradise, etc)
Cologne (Green Irish Tweed, Citrus Basil, etc)

The scents will be chosen for each box based on availability within the chosen scent family, but you'll probably love them all!

name: "The Works" Gift Set
description:
If you're like me, sometimes you just want a little bit of everything, and that's ok because in "The Works" gift set, that's exactly what you'll get:

1) TWO 4oz Scrubs of Your Choice
2) TWO 4oz Body Butters of Your Choice
3) TWO 4oz Whipped Soap of Your Choice
4) ONE 2oz Mask of Your Choice
5) ONE 2oz Curl Royale Hair Cream (choose your fragrance)
6) ONE 2oz LaFace Creme 

(Don't forget to list your product/fragrance choices for numbers 1-5 in the comment/information box during checkout.)

name: Best Face Forward Gift Set
description:
Help your friends and family put their best face forward with a special collection of LaBella skincare products:

1) Green Machine Face Scrub (4oz) 
2) Mask of Your Choice (2oz)
3) Oooh La La Lavender Citrus Toner (4oz)*
4) LaFace Creme (1oz)

Not ready to commit? You can get a sample size of everything above for only $20!

(Please indicate which mask you'd like in the "Note to Seller" box during checkout. If this information is not included, I'll select a mask for you at the time of shipping based on availability!)

name: Easy Breezy Set
description:
Couple your choice of any 4oz LaBella body butter with your choice of any 4oz body scrub for only $20. Or make it a butter/butter mix, or a scrub/scrub combo. Your choice! 

Give them as a gift or keep them for yourself. Either way, it's a great deal!

(Please include your selections in the comment/information box during checkout)

name: Whipped Soap Sampler
description:
Give the gift of cleanliness this holiday season with the Whipped Soap Sampler. Get three 4oz jars of Whipped Soap Souffle in your chosen scent family, wrapped in a LaBella box, ready for gifting.


You choose the scent combination:

Citrus (Ginger Lime, Citrus Sangria, etc.)
Floral (White Lily & Jasmine, Honeysuckle, FlowerBomb, etc.)
Fresh (Peppermint, Lemongrass Verbena, etc.)
Tropical (Hawaiian Hibiscus, Pomegranate Mango, etc.)

Classic (Black Musk, Woodland Paradise, etc)
Cologne (Green Irish Tweed, Citrus Basil, etc)

The scents will be chosen for each box based on availability within the chosen scent family, but you'll probably love them all!

name: Shea Soufflé Set
description:
This set features a 4oz Whipped Soap Soufflé  and the *matching* 4oz What You Shea? Body Butter in LaBella's most popular fragrances for only $15.

OR size up to 8oz Whipped Soap and and 8oz What You Shea? for $30!

name: What You Shea? (Body Butter)
description:
"What You Shea?" Body Butter is a light butter that will leave your skin soft and oh so smooth!  Virgin sweet almond oil and luxurious avocado oil both sink deep into skin to seal in moisture while safflower oil dries to a satin finish without leaving you feeling greasy. Ash will be a thing of the past and your skin will feel better than ever! 

Massage into your skin while still damp after a shower or bath and you'll feel your skin drink it up. (Remember - there are NO fillers in any LaBella Body Butter so less is definitely more!)

Ingredients: Shea Butter, Soy Butter, Virgin Sweet Almond Oil, Safflower Oil, Jojoba Oil, Avocado Oil

2oz = $6 (sample size)
4oz = $11
8oz = $19

name: Aromatherapy Satchets
description:
These fragrant satchets can be used to freshen your drawers, closets, or any small space. But, the uses don't stop there! Try throwing one into your gym bag, or in your dryer to naturally scent your clothes.  You can also keep one under your pillow at night: the lavender scent works great to calm nerves and promote restful sleep (great for insomniacs!) and peppermint can stimulate the senses, help aid digestion and relieve headaches and migraines. There's no way you can go wrong with these little guys! 


(Sold in sets of two)

name: Fizzy Bath Salts
description:
Get ready for a luxurious soak in your bath with our new Fizzy Bath Salt. Dead Sea Salt has 10x the minerals as ordinary sea salt and is rich in potassium, magnesium and calcium. Dead Sea Salt can be useful for helping to relieve symptoms of eczema and psoriasis, as is lavender which helps soothe irritated skin. When combined with light natural oils as it is here, it will also moisturize while it heals. 

(2 tubes in a set)

Ingredients: Pure Dead Sea Salt, Sodium Bicarbonate, Citric Acid, Corn Starch, Lavender Flowers, Sesame Seed Oil, Rice Bran Oil, Jojoba Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil, Sweet Almond Oil, Essential Oil Blend including Lavender

name: Whipped Soap Soufflé
description:
Treat your skin with this luxuriously creamy soap which has been whipped into decadence along with shea butter and pure olive oil with jojoba beads sprinkled on top for a light, gentle exfoliation. Whipped Soap Soufflé will forever change the way you think about showers.

This product is pH balanced to be gentle to even the most sensitive skin and safe for your lady bits, LaBella Whipped Soap Soufflé lathers beautifully and rinses clean to leave your skin irresistibly soft. Try using some as shaving cream for your silkiest shave yet! 

Lathers best with a loofah! 

Ingredients: Sulfate Free Bath Butter (glycerin based soap), Shea Butter, Extra Virgin Olive Oil, Virgin Sweet Almond Oil, Fragrance, Jojoba Beads 

4oz = $7.50
8oz = $12.00
16oz = $21.00

(This product must set for at least 24 hours once made and fragranced, please allow an extra day or two for shipping!)

name: LaFace Creme
description:
LaFace Creme is especially formulated for your face. This light as air formula sinks right in to leave your skin smooth and supple, without feeling or looking "greasy". Hempseed oil is full of omega fatty acids to nourish the skin, while the powerful triple combo of calendula, chamomile, and evening primrose extracts act as soothing anti-inflammatory agents to prevent or tone down any redness or irritation. Rosehip oil will help fade scars or hyperpigmentation and finally, tea tree oil is naturally antifungal and antibacterial, which helps neutralize breakouts before they start.

After cleansing your face and hands, dab a VERY SMALL amount on your index finger, rub onto your other fingers and gently massage into your face. After 5-10 minutes, LaFace Creme should be completely absorbed. If not, you've used too much product. A small dab is all you need. 

* For a wonderful treat for your face, I suggest using LaFace Creme following any of our mask treatments. Your skin will rejoice!*
 
Ingredients: Shea Butter, Pure Unrefined Hempseed Oil, Argan Oil, Rosehip Seed Oil, Calendula Extract, Chamomile Extract, Evening Primrose Extract, Jojoba Oil, Tea Tree Essential Oil, preservative (very small amount, paraben free)

(No added fragrance. Has a natural green/fresh fragrance due to the combination of tea tree essential oil and unrefined hempseed oil.)

name: Nouveau Riche (Body Butter)
description:
"Nouveau Riche" is a power house butter designed for those who need a heavier dose of long lasting moisture. This butter will also help those with mild to moderate eczema. Ucuuba butter is anti-inflammatory, antiseptic and extremely high in essential fatty acids to sooth aging, dry, or irritated skin while the oils in combination help lock moisture deep down into the skin. 

Massage into your skin while still damp from your shower or bath. There are no fillers in any LaBella body butter, so less is definitely more!

Ingredients: Shea Butter, Soy Butter, Babassu Oil, Olive Oil, Ucuuba Butter, Argan Oil, Jojoba Oil, Avocado Oil, Evening Primrose Oil
 

2 oz: $7.50 (sample)
4 oz: $13
8 oz: $23

name: Green Machine - Acne Fighting Face Scrub
description:
Use the power of thyme to fight acne and prevent breakouts with this gentle scrub. Here, a mild cleansing base is mixed with ground apricot shells for exfoliation along with thyme and white willow bark extracts, as well as hempseed and rosehip oils. 

Excellent for oily and combination skin. Use 2-3x per week for best results and always apply LaFace Creme afterwards, or your preferred LaBella toner + LaFace Creme.

Ingredients: Sulfate free bath butter, ground apricot shells, glycerin, unrefined hempseed oil, green tea extract, white willow bark extract, thyme extract, chamomile extract, rosehip oil, tea tree essential oil, preservative (very small amount, paraben free)

2oz: $7 (sample)
4oz: $12

name: Clay Mask Sampler or Gift Set
description:
Having a hard time choosing between the masks? We understand. Choosing can be tough, so why not try all of them? In the mask sampler, you get a quarter oz packet of each of our four masks - Bottom of the Seaweed, Monkey Face, One More Thyme, and What's the Tea? - just enough for one mask each. From there, you can choose your favorite and believe me, you'll want a full size! ($12)

Gift set: You can upgrade to .5oz packets of each mask which also includes a 1oz jar of LaFace Creme for only $25.

name: LaBella Signature Sampler or Gift Set
description: Not sure what you want? Well, we have the solution - The LaBella Signature Sampler Pack. Here, you get samples of our most popular products all bundled together - 2oz of both the LaBella Signature Body Polish and the Whipped Body Polish, as well as a 2oz body butter and a small mask sample for only $20! Gift Set: Instead of 2oz scrubs and body butter, you get 4oz of each as well as a larger mask sample for $30. Options: 1. Tropical: Mango Papaya Body Polish, Pomegranate Mango Whipped Polish, Pina Colada "Alotta Colada" Body Butter, and a sample of "Monkey Face" or "Pina Party" mask. 2. Citrus: Grapefruit Body Polish, Citrus Sangria Whipped Polish, Ginger Lime "What You Shea?" Body Butter, and a sample of "What's the Tea?" mask. 3. Fresh/Herbal: Peppermint Body Polish, Rosemary Eucalyptus Whipped Polish, Lemongrass Verbena "What You Shea?" Body Butter, and a sample of "Bottom of the Seaweed" mask. 4. Woodsy: Bamboo & Teak Body Polish, Woodland Paradise Whipped Polish, Sandalwood "What You Shea" body butter, and a sample of "One More Thyme" mask. *Please note - I reserve the right to substitute similar scents/products if any of the above choices are unavailable at the time of shipping* Currently - The Whipped Polish is out of stock and being replaced with an additional regular Signature Polish.

name: Smooth As Silk - LaBella Scrub Sampler / Gift Set
description:
Looking at all the scrubs and can't pick just one? Get 2oz samples of our Refresh, Sublime, and Tropical Sunset scrubs for only $16 and scrub yourself to perfection. At such a low price, that's like buying two samples and getting one for free! 

Gift Set - Upgrades each 2oz Jar to 4oz for an even better deal!

Indulge. You know you want to!

(When ordering, enter your fragrance choice for your "Tropical Sunset" scrub in the instructions box during checkout)

name: Alotta Colada (Body & Hair Butter)
description:
"Alotta Colada" is a light/medium weight butter with a tropical theme that your skin will LOVE. Mango butter has moisturizing and skin regenerative qualities, which is great for scars. Coconut Oil is solid at room temperature but melts on contact to nourish and seal moisture into your skin. 

This product also doubles as a hair butter, leaving your hair smooth and luxurious as it seals in moisture and boosts shine!

Massage into your skin while still damp from your shower or bath. There are no fillers in any LaBella body butter, so less is definitely more!

HAIR: Use on damp hair to seal in moisture and style as usual. Fantastic for twists/twistouts! 

Ingredients: Shea Butter, Refined Mango Butter, Soy Butter, Virgin Coconut Oil, Apricot Kernel Oil, Virgin Sweet Almond Oil, Jojoba Oil, Vitamin E.

2oz = $7 (sample)
4oz = $12
8oz = $22
16oz = $42 (please email me to order!)

name: "In Your Dreams" Calming Baby Butter
description:
Specifically formulated for the delicate skin of babies and children, this amazing butter is also great for eczema as well as highly sensitive, inflamed, dry or patchy adult skin. The natural aromas of chamomile and lavender promotes calm and relaxation as this butter locks in moisture, soothes dry skin, and relieves inflammation. It glides very smoothly across the skin, making this the perfect butter to use for a nightly after bath massage for your baby. They'll be lulled to a peaceful sleep in no time!


Ingredients: Chamomile Butter, Shea Butter, Soya Bean Oil, Sunflower Oil, Aloe Vera Oil, Perilla Seed Oil, Organic Chamomile Essential Oil, Organic Lavender Essential Oil, Ylang Ylang Essential Oil

2oz:    $8
4oz:    $12
8oz:    $21

name: Honey Love Triple Moisturizing Conditioner
description:
This conditioner is FANTASTIC! The simple, yet amazingly effective formula amps up the moisture with just enough weight to reduce frizz without weighing hair down. Silicone free and CG method friendly, Honey Love is also pH balanced for optimal hair health. I guarantee you'll immediately notice a difference vs commercial conditioners: Hair will look and feel healthier, curls form better and straight hair gets sleeker. What's not to love about Honey Love?

The triple moisturizing power of Honey, Macadamia Oil, and Coconut oil penetrates deep into the hair shaft leaving your hair moisturized shiny and full of luster while a touch of wheat protein replaces lost keratin to keep the hair strong, smooth the hair cuticle, and reduce the appearance of split ends and damage. Despite the absence of silicones, Honey Love makes detangling easier by coating and smoothing the hair shaft so hair doesn't "catch" onto itself as much. After using Honey Love, your curls will be less frizzy and blow outs will look like spun silk. How's that for versatile?

Trust me -- No matter how you wear your hair, you'll want to show it off after using Honey Love! 

Directions: After shampooing, apply Honey Love Triple Moisturizing Conditioner and leave on for 5 minutes. To use as a deep conditioner, leave on for 15-20 minutes. May also be used with heat. (I've also used Honey Love diluted with more water as a leave in with fabulous results)

Ingredients: Organic Aloe Vera Juice, Cetearyl Alcohol (fatty alcohol, non drying), Castor Oil, Stearalkonium Chloride, dl-Panthenol (Pro-Vitamin B5), Honeyquat, Macadamia Oil, Hydrolyzed Wheat Protein, Coconut Oil, Vegetable Glycerin, Meadowfoam Oil, Preservative, Fragrance

name: Honey Love Triple Moisturizing Shampoo
description:
Looking for a shampoo to get your hair clean without stripping your strands? Look no further than LaBella's new Honey Love Triple Moisturizing Shampoo! Honey Love is completely sulfate free, with gentle detergents to wash away dirt without leaving your hair dried out like most commercial shampoos. Honey Love is also pH balanced for hair, to ensure your cuticle lies flat after rinsing, helping hair look healthier by reducing the appearance of split ends.

With the triple power of Honeyquat, Shea Oil, and Macadamia Oil to soften, moisturize, and add luster, you'll wonder how you ever got along without it.  Honeyquat deeply penetrates the hair shaft and improves combability to help prevent snarls and make detangling a breeze, especially when followed with the matching Honey Love Triple Moisturizing Conditioning Mask!


Ingredients: Water, Organic Aloe Vera Juice, Sodium Olefin Sulfonate, Cocamidopropyl Betaine, Coco-Glucoside, Glyceryl Oleate, Sodium Chloride (Sea Salt),  Honeyquat, Vegetable Glycerin, Shea Butter Oil, Macadamia Oil, Organic Chamomile Extract, Organic Calendula Extract, Organic Comfrey Extract, Organic Kelp Extract, Vitamin E, Vitamin C, Citric Acid, Xanthum Gum (Natural Thickener), Fragrance, Preservative

name: Bodacious Body, Bath, & Massage Oil
description:
Take care of your skin and hair with this amazing blend of oils designed to drench your skin in luxury leaving it soft, smooth, and smelling fantastic. 

The glide on this is amazing for massages! It allows hands to glide smoothly over skin then sinking in for a smooth finish. Add a few drops to your bath for a fragrant soak, or massage into your skin while still damp to seal in moisture and stop dry skin in its tracks.  

For added versatility - You can also use this oil on your hair. Use as a pre-shampoo treatment or add it to your favorite conditioner for an extra moisture boost!

Ingredients: Safflower Oil, Organic Soya Bean Oil, Virgin Sweet Almond Oil, Glycerin, Avocado Oil, Wheatgerm Oil, Calendula Extract, Green Tea Extract, Evening Primrose Extract, Fragrance

A little goes a long way, so use sparingly - especially if using as a body oil. A few drops at a time should be sufficient. Use slightly more for massages.

name: Feel The Burn - Therapeutic Body/Massage Oil
description:
This formula takes our Bodacious Body Oil and adds a special blend of therapeutic essential oils including camphor, eucalyptus, menthol, and peppermint to help relieve tired, achy, fatigued muscles - a MUST have product for gym rats, new and old alike!

Ingredients: Safflower Oil, Organic Soya Bean Oil, Virgin Sweet Almond Oil, Glycerin, Avocado Oil, Wheatgerm Oil, Calendula Extract, Chamomile Extract, Evening Primrose Extract, Essential Oil Blend

name: Nouveau Lip Salve
description:
Are your lips dry, cracked, or irritated? LaBella has you covered with our Nouveau Lip Salve. Made with soothing mango and shea butters creamy babassu oil, moisturizing olive oil and healing extracts of chamomile and calendula. Your lips will feel good as new! 

Ingredients: Soy Wax, Mango Butter, Shea Butter, Babassu Oil, Olive Oil, Castor Oil, Honey, Calendula Extract, Chamomile Extract, Fragrance/Essential Oil 

**Currently available in a light peppermint scent, made with pure peppermint oil. More scent/flavor options will be available soon!**

name: Whipped Cucumber and Chamomile Face Cleanser
description:
Clean, tighten, and lightly exfoliate your skin with LaBella's newest addition to our line - the Whipped Cucumber and Chamomile Face Cleanser!

This product is formulated for everyday use for all skin types. Despite being gentle enough for even the most sensitive skin, this cleanser packs a powerful punch with Rhassoul and Fuller's Earth Clays which both help tighten skin while absorbing excess sebum from the skin's surface and encouraging skin cell turnover. Cucumber is a wonderful natural astringent and also contains Vitamin C which promotes skin healing and regeneration. The cleanser also contains acne fighting White Willow Bark, which is the natural form of Salicylic Acid - a very popular acne medication you see in commercial products. White Willow Bark aids in the prevention of white/black heads while also encouraging skin renewal to ensure your skin always looks its very best! Follow with LaFace Creme.

Ingredients: Sulfate Free Bath Butter, Rhassoul Clay, Fullers Earth Clay, Glycerin, Aloe Vera, Cucumber Extract, Chamomile Extract, Shea Butter, Castor Oil, White Willow Bark, Green Tea Extract, Rosehip Oil, Eucalyptus Essential Oil, Preservative (Paraben Free)

name: To The Tea! - Peppermint & Green Tea Toner/Aftershave
description:
Clean and cool those pores with our newest toner designed for normal, combination, oily, and/or acne prone skin to soothe, tone and tighten while restoring skin to the recommended pH level. In addition to toning, this product works like a dream as an aftershave splash, giving you the beloved cooling sensation while also reducing razor bumps and irritation.

Peppermint and green tea are both wonderful anti-inflammatory agents that reduce irritation. Aloe Vera is a powerful healing agent that encourages cell regeneration while soothing and toning skin. Our pure witch hazel distillate works a gentle, non-drying astringent alternative to the alcohols found in most store brand toners that frequently irritate skin. Finally, Fruit Acid Complex is a unique blend of fruit acids (AHAs) that help your skin shed old cells so that your complexion is brighter, clearer, and more vibrant. Proper shedding of old skin cells is key to eliminating razor bumps and ingrown hair. White willow bark helps reduce blackheads, whiteheads, and other blemishes.

*ALWAYS moisturize after toning. I recommend pairing with Laface Creme!*
 
Ingredients: Witch Hazel Distillate (Alcohol Free), Distilled Water, Organic Aloe Vera Juice, Organic Peppermint Extract, Glycerin, Green Tea Extract, White Willow Bark Extract, Fruit Acid Complex (Blend of Organic Fruit Extracts, including Sugar Cane, Lemon, and Orange Extracts), Chamomile Extract, Preservative (Paraben Free)

name: Pharoah Gift Package
description:
This is the perfect introduction to LaBella products for men. It includes both face and body products to keep their skin clear and moisturized. 

With specially selected scents tailored for men, you'll get all the LaBella products fit for, well  - a Pharaoh! 

This package includes:

1. ONE 4oz Whipped Soap Soufflé in "Black Musk"

2. ONE 4oz Signature Polish in "Woodland Paradise"

3. ONE 4oz Nouveau Riche Body Butter in "Green Irish Tweed"

4. ONE 2oz Green Machine Face Scrub

5. ONE 1oz LaFace Creme

name: CoCo Chic (Body Butter)
description:
"CoCo Chic" is a medium weight body butter which takes an old school classic and gives it a new school twist. Cocoa butter has been used by our mothers and grandmothers for generations in the battles against dry skin, scars, and stretchmarks. Here, it's whipped with skin nourishing almond and coconut oils, along with rosehip oil reknowned for its skin regenerative qualities. 

Massage into your skin while still damp from your shower or bath. There are no fillers in any LaBella body butter, so less is definitely more!

(Not for use on your face!!)

Ingredients: Cocoa Butter, Shea Butter, Virgin Sweet Almond Oil, Unrefined Coconut Oil, Avocado Oil, Rosehip Oil, Vitamin E, Fragrance (optional)
*Please note that unscented still has a slight naturally chocolately aroma*

2oz: $8 (sample)
4oz: $12
8oz: $21

name: Oooh La La Lavender Citrus Toner
description:
This gentle, yet effective toner is alcohol free and works well on all skin types, from dry or sensitive to normal to oily. It helps to rid your face of any dirt or makeup your cleanser may have missed, shrinks the appearance of pores, and prepares your face for your moisturizer. Perhaps more importantly, it helps restore your skin's natural pH balance after cleansing, which is an important step in preventing acne for those who are prone to breakouts.

Witch hazel is fantastic astringent, and without the pesky alcohols in many store brands, cleans and tones even the most sensitive skin without causing dryness or irritation. Lavender soothes and heals skin while also reducing scarring while the citrus oils brighten the complexion by encouraging cell renewal and turnover. Like the chamomile extract, lavender is also a wonderful anti-inflammatory which will tone down any redness or irritation. Lemon oil fades/lightens acne scars as well as dark circles under eyes. Glycerin and panthenol both soften skin while they work as humectants, drawing moisture deep into skin.

Contains NO artificial colors or fragrances.

Ingredients: Pure Witch Hazel Distillate, Lavender Water, Distilled Water, Aloe Vera Juice, Glycerin, Essential Oils of Lemon and Grapefruit, Polysorbate 20 (Emulsifier), Chamomile Extract, Panthenol (Vitamin B5), Vitamin E, Castor Oil, Citric Acid, Preservative (at 0.5%, paraben free)


Note: Unlike most store bought toners, this product is naturally cloudy as a result of the botanical ingredients. Although it contains an emulsifier, some of the oils may still separate. Please shake vigorously before each use.


1oz:    $6 (Sample/Travel Size - PERFECT for your gym bag!)
4oz:    $12
8oz:    $20

name: Curl Royale Hair Cream
description:
Are you a naturalista looking for something to make those curls and coils POP? Well, look no further than LaBella's Curl Royale Hair Cream. This creamy delight sinks right in to lock moisture into your hair leaving your curls incredibly soft, smooth, and shiny. Use on damp hair to seal and style or use on dry hair to smooth flyaways. 

Relaxed and straight ladies can use this as well - try rubbing a dab or two into your hair and ends before blow drying or put a little on your ends before wrapping your hair at night to help maintain moisture and hair growth. 

GUYS - This works like a dream on beards and cuts. You want a soft, touchable beard or waves to make the ladies take notice? Curl Royale is for you! (Bella Tip - Try Black Musk, Woodland Paradise or any of my other masculine scents!)

Believe me, no matter how you choose to wear your hair, Curl Royale Hair Cream has something awesome to offer you. 

Ingredients: Shea Butter, Soy Butter, Olive Oil, Argan Oil, Castor Oil, Avocado Oil, Virgin Sweet Almond Oil, Nettle Extract


4oz:    $11
8oz:    $18

name: "Flake Out" Intensive Scalp Repair Cream
description:
Kick those flakes to the curb with this nourishing cream filled to the brim with ingredients specifically chosen for their healing and soothing abilities! "Flake Out"  is perfect for problematic scalps, so if you suffer from dry, inflamed, itchy scalp or if you battle dandruff, scalp psoriasis or eczema, this is for YOU. This product also encourages hair growth and is fantastic for areas prone to breakage such as the edges of your hair, nape and temple areas. 

Use as you would any hair or scalp cream. For a special delight, try using as an intensive scalp treatment with a heat cap the same as you would a hot oil treatment. Your hair will be smooth and moisturized upon rinsing and your scalp will feel brand new!

Hemp seed is a wonder oil that provides essential fatty acids in the exact ratios needed for perfect absorption into skin and hair, where it aids in cell regeneration and nourishes from the inside out. It is also one of the strong anti-inflammatory oils available and will help sooth any irritation caused by scratching.

Neem oil is antibacterial, anti-microbial, anti-inflammatory and also encourages hair growth and strength. 

Peppermint, rosemary, and eucalyptus essential oils are also anti-inflammatory and in addition to stimulating blood flow to your scalp they encourage the purging of toxins that may be blocking hair follicles and hindering growth. 

Chamomile and calendula extracts sooth and condition skin, helping it heal.

Ingredients: Shea Butter Blend, Soy Butter, Unrefined Hemp Seed Oil, Olive Oil, Castor Oil, Avocado Oil, Neem Oil, Peppermint Essential Oil, Eucalyptus Essential Oil, Tea Tree Essential Oil, Rosemary Essential Oil, Chamomile Extract, Calendula Extract, Peppermint Fragrance, Preservative (small amount, paraben free)

2oz - $7.50 (sample)
4oz - $13
8oz - $22 (coming soon)

name: LaBella Signature Body Polish
description:
I'll admit to this being my personal favorite scrub! Cane sugar and sea salt combine to polish your skin to perfection while the luxuriously creamy soy butter and coconut oil leave your skin so smooth and moisturized you won't want it to end!

Instructions: After washing - turn off the water in the shower, scoop out the scrub and rub onto your skin paying close attention to any rough areas. Turn the shower back on, rinse quickly and you're done. The oils will stay on your skin, with no need for lotion. (Be careful getting in/out of the shower as both you and the bath floor may be slippery!)

Ingredients: Cane Sugar, Pure Sea Salt, Virgin Coconut Oil, Soy Butter, Safflower Oil, Glycerin, Virgin Sweet Almond Oil, Vitamin E, Fragrance.

*Includes NO preservatives. To help keep your scrub fresh, please use a clean spoon to scoop your scrub out of the jar. Using your wet hands may encourage bacteria growth*
 

2 oz: $7.00 (sample)
4 oz: $11.00
8 oz: $18.00

name: LaBella Signature Whipped Body Polish
description:
Whipped Body Polish is a soap based scrub that rinses clean with no oily after effects. pH balanced to be gentle to skin, the formula will lightly emulsify when mixed with water. The result is a soft yet non-oily scrub, perfect for all skin types. I suggest coupling this with the body butter of your choice for the ultimate one-two punch!

Ingredients: Pure Sea Salt, Cane Sugar, Sulfate Free Bath Butter, Sulfate Free Shea Butter Soap, Shea Butter, Virgin Sweet Almond Oil, Virgin Olive Oil, Fragrance, Color

4 oz: $11
8 oz: $18 (coming soon)

**THIS ITEM IS CURRENTLY UNAVAILABLE WHILE I REFORMULATE**

name: "Refresh" - Grapefruit Eucalyptus Scrub
description:
"Refresh" scrub is designed to refresh your skin and awaken your senses. This all natural scrub is chock full of awesomeness!! The exfoliants, coupled with the fruit acids in grapefruit essential oil help you slough off old skin, while the soy butter, coconut and other oils create a barrier locking in the moisture to the newly revealed skin. One use and you'll wonder how you ever did without it!

Instructions: After washing - turn off the water in the shower, scoop out the scrub and rub onto your skin paying close attention to any rough areas. Turn the shower back on, rinse quickly and you're done. The oils will stay on your skin, with no need for lotion. (Be careful getting in/out of the shower as both you and the bath floor may be slippery!)

Ingredients: Cane Sugar, Sea Salt, Unrefined Coconut Oil, Soy Butter, Safflower Oil, Glycerin, Virgin Sweet Almond Oil, Vitamin E, Essential Oil Blend Including Grapefruit and Eucalyptus.

*Includes NO preservatives. To help keep your scrub fresh, please use a clean spoon to scoop your scrub out of the jar. Using your wet hands may encourage bacteria growth*
 

2 oz: $8 (Sample)
4 oz: $12
8 oz: $20

name: SubLime - Avocado Lime Scrub
description:
Sublime Body Scrub is just that - Sublime. Enriched with avocado and olive oil, it will drench your skin with moisture while the salt, sugar, and fruit acid from the lime oil help you scrub off any rough patches. It will leave your skin smooth, moisturized and lightly citrus scented. Absolutely divine!

Instructions: After washing - turn off the water in the shower, scoop out the scrub and rub onto your skin paying close attention to any rough areas. Turn the shower back on, rinse quickly and you're done. The oils will stay on your skin, with no need for lotion. (Be careful getting in/out of the shower as both you and the bath floor may be slippery!)

Ingredients: Sea Salt, Cane Sugar, Safflower Oil, Glycerin, shea Butter, Avocado Oil, Olive Oil, Jojoba Oil, Chamomile Extract, Essential Oil Blend including Lime.

*Includes NO preservatives. To help keep your scrub fresh, please use a clean spoon to scoop your scrub out of the jar. Using your wet hands may encourage bacteria growth*

2 oz: $8 (Sample)
4 oz: $12
8 oz: $21

name: "Tropical Sunset" Cream Body Scrub
description:
Tropical Sunset scrub is like a vacation in a jar! The larger Demerara sugar crystals ensure vigorous exfoliation and coupled with the skin sloughing abilities of pineapple, you are sure to be smoothly polished immediately upon using this scrub. And, the whipped shea and mango butters along with the coconut oil mixture will make sure you stay fabulously moisturized all day! 

Instructions: After washing - turn off the water in the shower, scoop out the scrub and rub onto your skin paying close attention to any rough areas. Turn the shower back on, rinse quickly and you're done. The oils will stay on your skin, with no need for lotion. (Be careful getting in/out of the shower as both you and the bath floor may be slippery!)

Ingredients: Demerara Sugar, Cane Sugar, Shea Butter, Coconut Oil, Mango Butter, Glycerin, Virgin Sweet Almond Oil, Wheatgerm Oil, Jojoba Oil, Pineapple extract, Fragrance

*Includes NO preservatives. To help keep your scrub fresh, please use a clean spoon to scoop your scrub out of the jar. Using your wet hands may encourage bacteria growth*
 

2 oz: $8.00 (Sample)
4 oz: $13.00
8 oz: $22.00

name: "Bottom of the Seaweed" Peppermint & Seaweed Purifying Mask
description:
If I had to pick one word to describe this mask, it would be 'WOW". Australian Green Clay purifies skin by pulling accumulated toxins out of your pores as it rebalances oil production as well as firms and repairs damaged skin. Seaweed encourages the release of toxins buried deep into your skin and replaces them with essential nutrients such as Vitamin C and magnesium. Peppermint relieves inflammation, increases circulation and tones/revitalizes dull complexions. Your skin will GLOW after using this mask.

To complete the experience, I highly recommend following up by applying our LaFace Creme!

Ingredients: Australian Green Clay, Rhassoul Clay, Seaweed Powder, Aloe Powder, White Willow Bark Extract, Peppermint Extract, Chamomile Extract

WARNING: Do NOT use this mask if you are allergic to iodine.

0.5oz Sample: $6 (1-2 masks)
2oz Pouch: $13 (5-6 masks)

name: "Cool As A Cucumber" Peppermint and Cucumber Soothing Mask
description:
Simple and gentle yet effective, this mask is great for sensitive skin that needs light astringent and tightening action. Australian Ivory Clay is one of the most gentle clays available, and mixed with a smaller amount of rhassoul clay it balances and cleans even the most sensitive skin. Cucumber is anti-inflammatory and rich in nutrients that support cell growth/repair and help to revitalize skin, while working as a light astringent to visibly firm and tone. Peppermint awakens the skin and helps purge impurities, while also working to increase blood flow. All in all, your skin will LOVE this mask.

To complete the experience, follow up by applying our LaFace Creme!

Ingredients: Australian Ivory Clay, Rhassoul Clay, Aloe Powder, Cucumber Extract, Peppermint Extract, Chamomile Extract

name: "Monkey Face" Banana & Honey Moisturizing Face Mask
description:
Formulated for normal, combination, to dry skin. Here, we mix gentle Australian ivory clay with powerful rhassoul clay for a lightly detoxifying mask that absorbs surface oil and tones skin, but without too much "pull". Banana and honey are both known for their moisturizing abilities and combined with aloe powder and carrot seed extract your face will be left smooth and hydrated. 

To complete the experience, follow up by applying our LaFace Creme!

Ingredients: Australian Ivory Clay, Rhassoul Clay, Aloe Powder, Banana Extract, Dried Honey Powder, Carrot Seed Extract

name: "One More Thyme" Thyme Tea Acne Fighting Face Mask
description:
"One More Thyme" has been formulated especially for those with oily/acne prone skin. Australian Green Clay is a very powerful detoxifying clay that also balances oil production and strengthens skin. Thyme is strongly antibacterial and anti-inflammatory and has been proven to be one of the best natural weapons against acne. Green tea provides anti-oxidants to help combat and repair the effects of aging and environmental factors. Finally, chamomile soothes and softens skin. In a word, this mask is AWESOME.

Ingredients: Australian Green Clay, Rhassoul Clay, Aloe Powder, Green Tea Extract, Thyme Extract, Chamomile Extract, White Willow Bark Extract, Rosemary Essential Oil

name: "What's the Tea" - Green Tea & Lime Clarifying Face Mask
description:
Formulated for normal to oily/clogged/acne prone skin. Rhassoul Clay is a powerful clay known to detoxify and balance skin all skin types, improve skin clarity and texture, as well as reduce whiteheads/blackheads and remove dead skin layers.

Rhassoul clay is combined with astringent and skin brightening lime extract, soothing aloe, skin rejuvenating green tea extract, anti-inflammatory chamomile botanical extract, anti-bacterial tea tree oil, and acne fighting white willow bark, to make a powerful yet gentle mask that is sure to leave your skin smooth and clean with a noticeably brighter complexion! Over time, regular use of this mask will also help with hyper-pigmentation and help to lighten acne scars due to the clay, the ascorbic acid and the alpha hydroxy acids found in lime extract, as well as the skin sloughing effects of white willow bark.

To complete the experience, follow up by applying our LaFace Creme!
 
Ingredients: Rhassoul Clay, Aloe Powder, Green Tea Extract, White Willow Bark Extract, Chamomile Extract, Calendula Extract, Lime Extract, Tea Tree Essential Oil

*I suggest using this as a full mask at night as it may cause some temporary redness due to the power of the clay pulling the toxins out of your pores.*
